# Open Source Software

`reservoir_nn` is a package that enables the use of reservoir computing architectures in Keras. It enables the flexible creation of reservoir layers that can be used just like any other type of Keras layer. [github](https://github.com/keras-team/reservoir_nn)

`SIMON`: a character-level CNN + LSTM for text classification. Transfer learn with the model to make inferences about class membership of text data, e.g., age prediction, spam classification, text similarity for arbitrary classes, etc. [arXiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/1901.08456)

CatLearn DIVA: the DIVergent Autoencoder implemented in `R` (2016). Available as a module in the `catlearn` `R` Package for computational modelling of formal psychological theories. `catlearn` is a framework and archive for distributed collaboration in formal modeling in psychology. [r-forge](http://catlearn.r-forge.r-project.org)

Wills, A. J., Edmunds, C. E., Kurtz, K. J., & Honke, G. A Practical Introduction to Distributed Collaboration for Formal Modeling: A Half-day Tutorial. Tutorial at the 50^th^ Annual Meeting of the Society for Mathematical Psychology, University of Warwick, UK.

Catlearn Supplementals. `catlearn.suppls` is an `R` package that provides a suite of helper functions for cognitive modeling under the `catlearn` framework. [github](http://www.github.com/ghonk/catlearn.suppls)
